concept.display: A fatty hilum within a lymph node on CT is considered a benign characteristic.
concept.definition: A fatty hilum within a lymph node on CT is considered a benign characteristic.

concept.display: It was shown that loss of fatty hilum is not a defi- nite criterion for differentiation between malignant and benign lymph nodes [7]. Absence of hilum was found in as many as 9%% of reactive lymph nodes [6].
concept.definition: It was shown that loss of fatty hilum is not a defi- nite criterion for differentiation between malignant and benign lymph nodes [7]. Absence of hilum was found in as many as 9%% of reactive lymph nodes [6].
